translation: Others also, sacrificing with the wisdom-sacrifice, worship Me, the All-Faced, as one, distinct, and manifold.
commentary: 9.15 by the wisdomsacrifice? f and? Even also? Other others? Yajantah sacrificing? Me Me?,worship worhsip? as one as one? separately as different? Multiple in various ways? Visvatomukham the Allfaced.Commentary Others too sacrificing by the wisdomsacrifice? ie? seeing the Self in all? adore Me the One and the Manifold? present everywhere. They regard all the forms they see as the forms
